about_the_game:
Discover your fantasies in 3DXChat


Unleash your creativity and explore the limitless possibilities of 3DXChat, the ultimate adult multiplayer online experience. Craft your wildest desires, forge intimate connections, and shape your world in this immersive virtual realm.

Create your unique characters


Forge your identity with up to three meticulously crafted characters per account. Customize every detail of their appearance, from hairstyles to makeup, and dress them in a diverse wardrobe. Experiment with eye and hair colors, and choose from various materials to adorn your clothing. Your characters are your canvas; paint them with your imagination.

Journey through a variety of virtual worlds


Embark on a captivating journey through a virtual world teeming with diverse and enchanting romantic locales. All brought to life by the creative ingenuity of fellow players. Explore pristine beaches where you can share a sunset with that special someone or escape to secluded islands where intimate encounters await amidst lush tropical settings. Stroll hand in hand down bustling city streets, where the neon glow sets the perfect backdrop for a night of passion. For those seeking a touch of adventure, venture into mysterious dungeons where secrets and desires intertwine in the shadows.
Immerse yourself in vibrant parties under the stars, where you can dance the night away with your newfound friends or discover that elusive connection that makes your heart racing. The world of 3DXChat is a canvas of possibilities for the romantic at heart. It's all created by the imaginative contributions of our diverse player community, making each corner hold the promise of a unique and unforgettable encounter.

Connect, Date, and Indulge


Forge connections, whether they're fleeting or lasting, in 3DXChat. You can engage in brief, passionate encounters or build long-term relationships - the choice is yours. You can even take the plunge into marriage if you dare. With a wide variety of sexual positions for couples and groups, the game ensures that your every desire will be satisfied.

Build the world of your dreams


Unleash your architectural talents with our robust location editor and bring your dream world to life. Create the perfect setting for your gatherings, whether a lively dance party or a quiet night of poetry. With an extensive collection of building materials and tools, the only limit is your imagination. Invite others to experience your creations and turn your fantasies into reality.

Experience the ultimate adult gaming adventure where your desires come to life, connections are made, and fantasies are fulfilled. Dive into 3DXChat today and explore a world without boundaries. Are you ready to create your destiny?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual content that is intended for adults only. This includes nudity and detailed depiction of different erotic positions using lifelike 3D graphics.

name: 3DXChat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom II X4 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 2 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Experimental Oculus VR support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 4 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Experimental Oculus VR support

short_description: Discover 3DXChat, a cutting-edge adult 3D game for connecting and exploring sensual experiences online. Join now to chat, date, and indulge in lifelike 3D intimacy. Live out your fantasies in a limitless virtual world.
